titles: A censure upon Lilly's Grammar wherein, besides a discourse on the reason of education, are shewn : the contradictions, falsities and false words, omissions, repetitions, superfluous rules, and misplaced words in our grammar / by R.G., formerly of the Free-School in New-Castle.
author: R. G. (Richard Gower)
Garthwaite, Richard, 1621 or 2-1690.
publisher: Printed by B.W. for George Downs ...,
notes: Attributed to Richard Gower. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: English language --  Grammar --  Early works to 1800.
